Contains_Milk_Proteins.note: White milk-based filling implies the presence of milk proteins.

No_Added_Sugar.note: Customer explicitly requested fillings without added sugar.

High_Protein.note: Customer requested high protein content (<20%) as a preference.

Base_Type.note: Customer's first priority is a white milk-based filling.

Butter_Cookies_Inclusions.note: Customer mentioned interest in white filling with inclusions like butter cookies.

Lotus_Cream_Filling.note: Customer mentioned Lotus Cream filling as a potential option.

Protein_Content.note: Customer requested high protein content with a preference for <20%.

Stronger_Thicker_Bag.note: Document mentions the need for a stronger, thicker bag in the drum.

Sample_Quantity.note: Document mentions a 40kg sample sent for production testing.

White_Filling_Without_Cinnamon.note: Customer's first priority is a white milk-based filling without cinnamon.
